subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Thierry Henry scored in the first half and Fabian Espindola added a goal with 10 minutes left, leading the Red Bulls to a 2-0 victory over Toronto in Harrison, N.J.
snippet: Thierry Henry scored in the first half and Fabian Espindola added a goal with 10 minutes left, leading the Red Bulls to a 2-0 victory over Toronto in Harrison, N.J.
